Package presentation.controller.overview

Class PromptTypeOverviewController

java.lang.Object
presentation.uielements.window.TitledInitializableWindow
presentation.uielements.window.BDOWindow<BDO>
presentation.uielements.window.OverviewWindow<PromptType>
presentation.controller.overview.PromptTypeOverviewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class PromptTypeOverviewController extends OverviewWindow<PromptType>
Overview window controller for PromptType entries. Extends OverviewWindow to list items, provide a name filter, support an optional external filter, and open a details view to add new prompt types. Includes overview help.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Felix Seggeb√§ing

  • Constructor Details

    • PromptTypeOverviewController

      public PromptTypeOverviewController()
      Creates an overview without an external filter. Intended for default FXML construction.

    • PromptTypeOverviewController

      public PromptTypeOverviewController(Predicate<PromptType> filter)
      Creates an overview with the given external filter applied initially.
      Parameters:
      filter - predicate to pre-filter listed models; may be null

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
